responseText:
Smart thinking. A sharp blade's no help if a rogue wave or a sudden squall knocks you off your feet! So, we start at the deck: boots. Solid footing anchors every traveler. Gather a grem skin, and head to the leatherworker's bench to craft a pair of Riverstalker's Boots. Make them seaworthy and strong.

Show me your handiwork when it's done.
name: ANV_FTUE_BF_Artisan_Leatherworking_Zanai_5_Response
